JobFullDesc: This position is CONTINGENT upon funding, an open position, customer approval, completion of a favorable background investigation, and the ability to obtain and maintain a USPS sensitive clearance. An experienced Cybersecurity Project Manager – CSOC is needed to support the Operational Resilience Team (ORT) / CSOC Center of Excellence Evolution Team under CISO Operations in Falls Church, VA. Responsibilities & Required Skills:    Must be eligible to obtain a sensitive clearance – Position of Public Trust – and may be required to obtain a higher security clearanceWill support Cybersecurity Operations through the management of the Operations annual planning efforts, workstream tracking, and ORT team activities, as directed by DCISO SMO.5+ years cyber security experience2+ years program management experienceStrong working knowledge of:Cybersecurity planning concepts                                                   Cybersecurity Operations conceptsKnowledge of good project management principlesExcellent time management skillsExcellent team building skills                                                                                                           Excellent oral and written communication skillsExcellent interpersonal and organizational skills Desired Skills:  Bachelor’s degree (MBA preferred) PMP Certification Required Education:Bachelor of Science Degree with a major in Computer Science/Computer Engineering, Engineering, Science or a related field.  Two years of related work experience may be substituted for each year of degree-level education.    Desired Certifications:PMP, DOD 8570.1-M Compliance at IAT Level II;
